name: FREELOADERS
description:
DODGE BULLETS
UPGRADE YOUR ENEMIES
SURVIVE

Dodge enemy bullets while upgrading their attacks every 10 seconds.

You choose which turret to equip with an attack which will lead to more complex patterns.

More enemy attacks mean higher score multiplier, you receive a 24x bonus for filling all of enemy attacks slots.

Controls:
Mose for movement and Escape open the menu

(Mac and Linux builds have not been tested)

Submission for Bullet Hell Jam 2021

Theme: 10 seconds
